00034 #include <glib.h>
00035 #include <time.h>
00036 #include <rtp.h>
00037 
00038 #ifndef _MEMBERS_H_
00039 #define _MEMBERS_H_
00040 
00041 typedef struct {
00042     GTree* member_tree;
00043 } members_t;
00044 
00045 /* Members initialisation/termination */
00046 extern int members_init(members_t* m);
00047 extern void members_destroy(members_t* m);
00048 
00049 /* Add/remove members */
00050 extern void members_add_member(members_t *m, u_int32_t *s, rtcp_member_t* nm);
00051 extern void members_remove_member(members_t *m, u_int32_t *s);
00052 extern int members_add_sender(members_t *m, u_int32_t *s);
00053 extern int members_remove_sender(members_t *m, u_int32_t *s);
00054 
00055 /* Search functions */
00056 extern int members_new_member(members_t *m, u_int32_t* s);
00057 extern int members_new_sender(members_t *m, u_int32_t* s);
00058 extern GSList* members_get_senders(members_t *m);
00059 extern gpointer members_get_sender(members_t *m, const u_int32_t* ssrc);
00060 
00061 /* Misc */
00062 extern int members_num_members(members_t *m);
00063 extern int members_num_senders(members_t *m);
00064 
00065 /* Print members */
00066 extern void members_print(members_t* m);
00067 
00068 #endif
